main event: A round brilliant silver object was observed at dusk in Fallon, Nevada, believed to be Jupiter or possibly a satellite or asteroid.
interesting points: The sighting lasted for 30 minutes., The object was moving very fast and appeared thin., It was initially believed to be Jupiter., There was a mention of other possible identifications such as an asteroid or satellite., Several reports referred to the object as a bright silver light and it was observed from a control tower.
witness description: Control tower operator at Fallon NAS
